prompts.title: Prompts
prompts.description: Configure system prompts with conditional injection rules.
prompts.fields.name: Name
prompts.fields.actionTypeHelpPrepend: Inject prompt at the beginning of the conversation
prompts.fields.actionTypeHelpAppend: Inject prompt at the end of the conversation
prompts.conditions.title: Conditions
prompts.conditions.description: Define when this prompt should be applied
prompts.conditions.empty: No conditions set. This prompt will apply to all requests.
prompts.dialogs.create.title: Create Prompt
prompts.dialogs.edit.title: Edit Prompt
prompts.dialogs.delete.title: Delete Prompt
prompts.dialogs.delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
prompts.dialogs.statusChange.title: Change Prompt Status
prompts.dialogs.statusChange.description: Are you sure you want to enable "{{name}}"?
Are you sure you want to disable "{{name}}"?
prompts.dialogs.bulkEnable.title: Enable Prompts
prompts.dialogs.bulkEnable.description: Are you sure you want to enable {{count}} prompt(s)?
prompts.dialogs.bulkDisable.title: Disable Prompts
prompts.dialogs.bulkDisable.description: Are you sure you want to disable {{count}} prompt(s)?
prompts.dialogs.bulkDelete.title: Delete Prompts
prompts.dialogs.bulkDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} prompt(s)? This action cannot be undone.
